name: eslint-config-zmzhoi
description: This package is a shareable eslint config for react project.
author: zmzhoi

scripts.publish:pre: npm version prerelease && git push origin master --tags
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && git push origin master --tags
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && git push origin master --tags
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && git push origin master --tags
